hero.title:
The Next Class Schedule
Designed for Your Desktop Today

footer.desc: Bring a new personalized experience to your desktop, supporting Windows, macOS, and Linux.
footer.cr: Based on GPL v3 license release.

desktop.title: Say hello, to the future morphology of class schedule

personalization.title:
Plugins & Themes
Ultimate Customization
personalization.content: A Python-based plugin system and Plugin Plaza is provided in Class Widgets, you can install the plugins you need from the Plugin Plaza. And a theme system that shows individuality, allowing you to build your unique Class Widgets.

compatibility.title: Near-perfect Compatibility
compatibility.content: Class Widgets is built on PyQt and supports Windows, macOS, and Linux.

notification.title: Powerful Notification System
notification.content: Class Widgets provides a powerful notification system that can send reminders when class begins or ends. Plugins can also call the notification interface to make it more practical.

floating.title: A New Way to Hide
floating.content: The new hiding method - floating window, can condense the important information of Class Widgets into a lighter and more convenient window, to minimize its interference with teaching work as much as possible.

design.title: Ultimate Design Language
design.content: Class Widgets uses the Fluent Design language launched by Microsoft, and uses the QFluentWidgets UI library, to make the interface more concise, comfortable and smooth.

download.title: Download Class Widgets
download.description:
Download the Class Widgets application to use on your device. We provide versions for Windows, macOS, and Linux to ensure you can enjoy our software on any platform.

Or if you want to use or experience the new features, please download Class Widgets from the Actions page of its GitHub repository.

You will get a zip file, please extract it to a suitable location and run 'ClassWidgets.exe'. You can access settings or exit the program via the tray menu.
download.use_proxy: Use proxy to download (please check this option if the direct download speed is slow)

macos.title: Download for macOS
macos.description: Supports Apple Silicon and Intel processors.

windows.title: Download for Windows
windows.description:
Supports Windows 7 and above.
We provide x64 and x86 versions.

linux.title: Download for Linux
linux.description: Currently only supports Debian, please stay tuned for other versions.

footer.help: Need help? Go to our Github or join the Community

acknowledgements.view_all_on_github: View all contributors on GitHub
